channel.title: header on toso
channel.description: Recent content in header on toso

item.title: All You Need is Kill
item.description: I bought myself this manga as Christmas gift as I was interested in reading it again. This was the third time I’ve read it. This concept of redoing things is something I can’t get enough of, combined with science fiction and a little bit of mechas makes this manga a pure blast.

item.title: Alice in Borderland
item.description: Watched the second season. A little disappointed, not as good as the first one. I may read the actual manga one day but not on top of my list.

item.title: The Recruit
item.description: I wasn’t expecting much but the combination of spy and humor themes in the first two episodes hooked me in. I did not find it exceptional but still, looking forward for a second season.
